Last we left off, the party was making their way towards the center of the caldera where the portal torn open to the fire elemental plane resides over a flow of molten rock pouring in three directions from the center of the mountain. Seeing a number of entities swirling around, and some pouring forth from this open doorway, Vox Machina and their current temporary ally by the traveling dragonborn wizard/necromancer/candlemaker named Gern Blanston have made their way in this direction. Now, before we start, just to remind you guys, I guess we're getting pretty close to 16k subscribers, and when we hit 16k something with a sloth is going to happen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not tonight, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not, I don't think tonight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have a sloth on standby.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There will be a sloth apparently that will come here for 16k and a sloth. And if you want to watch Laura freak out--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah, so much!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well done, you, we'll be sending you a lot of fun goodies your way very shortly, so--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Our regards to ToastKing senior.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yes; well, you've made him proud. Make sure to let him know. We'll give him a little a little pipe or something inside too, it'll be good. All right, so you guys gather yourselves, stepping through the battlefield you had just encountered, the shattered and slowly melting pieces of ice that once were some of these fire elemental denizens scattered around your feet, you step forward as you see the somewhat human, somewhat flame-based entity come pouring out of the void, surrounded by other elementals, and one of the other standing salamander general-type individuals. You can see--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is coming out of the rift?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, coming out of the rift.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is that behind him, is that what the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the actual doorway right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, and so this is a pool of lava that they're coming out of?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, this is all molten--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Molten fire plane, more or less?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this is actual lava from the inside of the mountain that has been called forth and cracked through the surface, because of the presence of the tear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Probably fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Probably. I don't think this will be bad

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did not take a short rest, did we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you did not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There has been no time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to, and upon seeing this, drop my fire elemental form and I say: oh shit, I have a feeling this is the 'him' they were talking about. And I have a feeling he's not going to believe that I'm the real new master. So there's that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So do some cold stuff, like this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd like you all to make a stealth check, by the way, as this is transpiring, and these entities are now making--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace? Is that still in effect?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you cast Hunter's Mark, so the concentration on that ended, unfortunately, sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh wait, with Pass Without a Trace?

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are all having this conversation, hushed behind this barricade of broken tree elements, you can see this salamander general turn and hiss in that direction, look over, and point his trident in the direction of where you all are. You can see the larger fire elementals all of a sudden turn their attention in the direction of the party, as the humanoid floating about five feet off the ground, his lower form just this swirl of cinders and black ash, chuckles with his arms crossed. Points forward, and the elementals begin moving forward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can Keyleth do a quick ancillary action before shit happens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, this would be the initiative order now, so everyone roll initiative.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe they see something behind us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jesus, sucking it up today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, folks, this brings us to 25 to 20?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jude.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Don't make it bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (singing) Take a bad roll...

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yes, I'm 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 for Gern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: ErmahGern!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 for Percy. Ten to five?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight for Grog. Scanlan, what's your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, ten, sorry, ten, ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that brings us to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm seven, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, seven, thought I got you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody cares, Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: caboose.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Top of the combat round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, nope. Not leading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shitty initiative roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's going to be fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's cut things out of cardboard. This doesn't look fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There was planning. There was a thought process.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, towers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is just really-- we're doomed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, he was down in the play zone before!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tell me who wants to roll an arcana check as you see this entity rising up--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, absolutely.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will, as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For people who are proficient with it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, with disadvantage, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So tired.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Whoa! Get out of here, dragonborn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at the big brain on Gern.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm very smart.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) And as you say that, you recognize this entity and blurt out its name, just instinctually as you get a proper view of it. One of the many denizens of the fire elemental plane, this is an efreeti, it is a fire genie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A nefreeti?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Efreeti. Yes, the species is efreeti, but an ee-frit, ee-freet, however you want to pronounce it, a flame genie, generally hailing from the City of Brass and/or spaces around and in the fire elemental plane.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I could feel it from that side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was thinking it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I know, I could feel it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Floats above all of you, arms still crossed, opens its arms and as it chuckles, both hands just are engulfed in flames that congeal into these large fiery balls as it flings them both down in the direction of the party.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Feel like we're in MegaMan. A MegaMan boss.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to be at Scanlan and Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are Fireballs, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To Scanlan, that is 13?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, that is 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both just (fireball impacts), cracking into the ground to the sides of where you're standing, barely missing them. It keeps glaring down at the rest of you with a smile. Ending that, it brings us to Vax. You're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got a high stealth right beforehand, so am I hidden at the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as you know, depending on the individual. You don't know who saw you and who didn't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As far as I know. All right. Balls. I'm just going to throw three daggers at the salamander, right from where I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right from where you are? All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, okay, so. First is a 20, second is a 14, third is a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The first one was what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first and the third hit. If you are hidden, though, which you would technically be hidden from this individual, you do have advantage on those attacks, so you can reroll the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And if I'm hidden it's a surprise, right? On that guy? You tell me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no, it's a sneak attack if you're hidden. A surprise round is if they have no idea that you're there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I thought it was a-- okay, great! Fine. Love it. Okay, so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You have advantage, so maybe one of those would be a 20 if you rerolled them with their advantages.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. No, and other one, no. So, four, eight, 12, 13, 16, 20, 31, 35 for the first. And the second one is a ten.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kick us off strong!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The second dagger manages to come towards, it tries to parry out of the air, but in doing so just gets it embedded in its forearm and it shrieks out in pain, as that too vanishes and appears once again in your belt. Are you going to move, or stay where you are?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to move. I'm going to skip to my right and stand behind Grog and spank him on the ass and say: go get 'em, tiger.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Go get 'em, tiger." Right there. All righty.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My name's Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are those trees, do they have any substance at all, or are they just there to look pretty?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, you could get behind them if you want to, they're maybe about that wide.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're like Charlie Brown Christmas trees?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Practically. As far as the Cindergrove's concerned, they're pretty sad-looking. A lot of them have been destroyed and torn and pushed down around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. I'm going to try to use one as protection. I'm going to hop behind the one over this way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way, here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I'm going to Hunter's Mark the efreeti.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Mark the efreeti.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I'm going to use my Longbow of the Sky Sentinel. And I'm going to shoot him three times!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does not hit, nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What about 23?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. How about... mega miss. So one of those hits, because I'm a loser.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Streaking past, and the third one hits as he's holding the flame balls in his hands. Seeing the small impact, he just glares at you though the impact.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe we can find a squirrel or something.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A pagan ritual.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I can hook you up. I have a kit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Why am I not surprised?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 17 points of damage and that's it because I suck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 17 points of damage. And you are hiding behind the tree?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am hiding behind the tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of Vex's turn. It is now the elementals' turns.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: These piece-of-shit dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going to move in and actually consumes the space of Gern and his followers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not even a figurine, it's just a chunk of plastic.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Stimpy and Coral, poor guys.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Weren't there-- oh, they killed one, that's right, and you guys fucking killed one, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, it's going to make two strikes towards you, Gern. The fire elemental rushes in and just (slithering fire noises).

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Not the vest, not the vest!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 13 to hit. What's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 14 points of fire damage from the first one.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Doesn't feel very natural.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thanks for coming, thanks for playing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You caught fire from the impact with the fire elemental.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: It doesn't hurt, I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm part dragon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do dragonborn have natural fire resistance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Certain ones do, not blue ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: If it was lightning, it'd be fine. But no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends that elemental's turn. This one is going to step into the space where both Percy and Scanlan are. Both of you guys immediately suffer seven points of fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm halved because I have resistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, so you'd take three points. And it's going to make a strike on each of you. That's going to be a 14 versus you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That does not hit me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And then versus Percy. Same roll. 14.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter) Ah, you're adorable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Misses you both with a series of terrible attacks. That ends their turn. Gern, you're up. At the start of your turn--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: It's my turn.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But first you have to take your fire damage.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, I'm still on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just wreathed in fire, all around. It's a bad, bad Sunday for Gern.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh boy. I'm trying to find something that won't destroy-- How close is everyone to me? Everyone's pretty close.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one's near the big guy.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: No, but I'm standing right there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here, you can see it right here. You're that little red ring right there, and then your two followers are right there. If you have anything that goes in a cube, you'd be fine. Do you have anything that's a cube shot?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: And which way am I facing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Whichever way you want to be facing.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I mean, I guess-- I'd like to run around and throw another Cone of Cold aimed at that guy, and then up at the prick hovering above everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This direction, you mean?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yes. Aye!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you can move around to this side of the elemental, pushing past your allies, whip around, you get a little bit of a view through the fire and flames swirling around you. You concentrate and release a burst of cold energy. It might not be close enough.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Of course it is!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It'll be enough to get those two there.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right, well, I suppose that's better than nothing at all.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your DC?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. It fails. On the salamander, that's another big fail with a 13. So go ahead and roll 8d8 damage.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (counting) 40. I'm sorry. What was that last one? Shit. 35.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Great. So you see as a blast of winter arcane energy just skirts forward, casting most of the dark area here in snow and ice and sleet. You can see the front of this lava pond is cooled for the moment and actually can be walked across probably for one or two more rounds.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're still on fire, by the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are also still on fire. Someone has to take an action to try and douse the flames on him, whether it be himself or possibly your allies. You can still give actions to your two undead buddies.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh. In that case. I think I'd like to ask the zombie character, who I believe was-- no, Stimpy was the skeleton, this is Coral. I'd like to have Coral rip-- is my skin on fire, or is it just my vest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both, actually. The scales are starting to crisp.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Those are really hard to get!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The vest?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You could just have them swat you. Like (zombie grunting noises).

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I need to have the zombie hurl its body on top of me, onto the ground, and roll around on me, to get the flame off. It's a very stinky enterprise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, I'll allow this. You're intentionally going prone, so you start your next combat round on the ground, which means you'll have half your movement. As Stimpy hobbles over (zombie groan).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is Coral.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Is there like snow or ice on the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is behind the elemental, yes.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Can he scoop some up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The zombie can take one action, unfortunately, it's not a super intelligent creature. One or the other.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right, then, I suppose he just has to roll on top of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys glance over out of the corner of your eye and you see is the dragonborn all of a sudden jumps to the ground, sprawled out, snow angel style.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Do it! Just do it already! What are you waiting for?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this undead begins flailing about on top of his body. You're starting to get elements of decaying goo and--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yes, it's fucking terrible!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But the flames do eventually go out, over the next five to six seconds or so. What would you like Stimpy to do?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I mean, I guess-- I would have to give him a candle, wouldn't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You would, yes.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Right. Maybe he just scoops up as much ice and snow as possible, and attacks the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Snowball fight?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Snowball fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He picks up some of the frost on the ground with his skeletal hands. Flings it. Funnily enough, it hits.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Fuck yeah, it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it's right there. We'll say for that particular instance, it takes--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: What, like a hundred points of damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Immediate steam, in the face of a fire elemental.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I smell like cooked cow anus at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weird question, what saving throw does a creature have to make with your sword?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wisdom.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a wisdom saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's constitution.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution saving throw. Good to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just answered the first thing that popped into my head.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was wisdom, fascinating. Okay, I'm right in the thick of it, aren't it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to break away, I'll take the hit. I don't like attacking these things straight on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the top of your turn, by the way, you take nine points of fire damage, down to four, because you are also engulfed in flame, as is Scanlan for having passed over the space there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nine points of fire damage, down to four. Okay. I'm going to break away and take a run for it towards that crater in the far right corner.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way here?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Running past the fire elemental, it does get an attack of opportunity on you, swinging out with its flaming appendage. That is going to be a 13 to hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That ain't going to hit. That's fine, I'm going to take my bonus action, and I'm going to cast Hex on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On which one?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: On the one I just ran away from.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that elemental is now currently Hexed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With a disadvantage on constitution saving throws.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Teamwork!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't think he has any blood, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it saving throws, or is it ability checks?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ability checks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does not affect saving throws, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine. Since I've broken off from him, I'm going to take some shots at him anyway. I'll take three shots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First one is an 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's seven points of damage. Second one's a sharpshooter. That's 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jeez, leave some for the rest of us, big boy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, wait, why did it go back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, this is the one that took all the damage from the Cone of Cold, so this one is still fine. Robbed you of victory!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: That was so weird, he disappeared for a moment and then came right back!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't actually damaged him yet, have I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did seven damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was the first damage. The second damage I haven't done yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you have not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 20 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, nice. You're adding your Hexes to this, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm not! Oh, shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add d6 to each of these, buddy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for reminding me on the Hex. That's a 12, that's going to miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It actually separates its body for a second, the flames flickering away from the impact of the bullet, passing through, no effect, unfortunately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Weird thing. Can I spend an action surge and put myself out of the fire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know what, it's just fire. I will be on fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You will be on fire, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be on fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's just fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is holding the thing that's floating in the sky aloft? Is he flying? Is he supported on a column of fire?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: No, he's brought a plastic shelf with himself, apparently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, of course.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: He's just standing on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's Ikea-made, you just have to build it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's the "schlogel."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It appears to be flying. The very essence of this creature is partial flame and magic, and it's levitating as its lower form is a tiny dervish whirlwind of black ash and flame.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And he's a larger creature or smaller?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Large.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a large creature or smaller. Okay. I'm going to make him the boy in the bubble. I will cast Otiluke's Resilient Sphere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yay!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to make a bubble around him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First you take four points of fire damage, because you're on fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sure, whatever. No, wait, but it was nine, right? You said? Just four?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was when it originally got to you, and then you're still burning every turn until you put yourself out. The range on the resilient sphere is 30 feet, so you're going to want to get closer to cast it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. I'll walk. He's going to hit me, isn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is cool, currently, if you want to go across. You can get there, and that'll be enough distance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do that, and then straight up in the air.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it has to make a dexterity saving throw. What's the DC? The DC on your spells is a 20 right now, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it rolled a 19. 18 plus one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And, with that, suddenly you guys see Scanlan concentrate, shouting the magical incantation through the hand cone--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're in a ball, motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a pink-purple-hued globe of crystalline, magical arcane energy just form around the creature, and the efreet goes (grunting).

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does he fall, or can he continue to fly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sphere is weightless, so no, he stays where he is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And is it a good witch, or a bad witch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Science check. Does oxygen penetrate the sphere?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is still air inside.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Damn it. Because that would've been amazing if he just died.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I was looking away, what just happened?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Always look at me!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, I was looking at some grubs over by the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grubs?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm hungry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, and I'll turn around and I will heal Gern, because he's not doing great. With my bonus action, at a second level, I will cast Healing Word, and I will sing to him again, because he loves it so much.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: You know, I think I'm fine with 26 hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Gern, baby, Gern! Candle inferno! Gern, baby, Gern! Burn that mother down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Second level, that's 2d4 plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Five.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 2d4 plus five you heal.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, do I roll that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do I roll, or does he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whichever one. Doesn't matter to me.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Okay, so nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Scanlan, I believe that ends your turn. Keyleth, you're up.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Thank you. I will never again not watch your spellcasting! You tiny bundle of adorable creature!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that guy and that guy within 30 feet of each other? It's hard to tell with the thing on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is 30 feet between them, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A 30 foot long spell could hit both of them, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A 30 foot long spell could-- It could only hit one. It's 30 feet between them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. But this guy-- oh, damn it. What about this guy and this guy? They're within 30 feet, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 35 between them. These two, there is definitely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Actually, yeah, let me do that. I am going to cast a Tidal Wave right here and I'm going to go outward in this direction, and it's ten foot wide and 30 foot long, so let me back up a little bit out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So it's ten feet wide, and it'll go (rushing water) like that, you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you back up to there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Okay, dexterity save on each of them. Dexterity save on the first one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Since it's water, do they have disadvantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not for the saving throw. The first one does make the saving throw, however, that is a 19 plus three, so 22. On a success, it takes half as much damage and isn't knocked prone, so it takes half. The other one, however, does fail.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they take more damage because it's water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much is in the spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It does 4d8 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, go ahead and roll that. I'd say, how many gallons would that be? That's a shit-ton of gallons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh, that's good. 12 plus eight is 20, plus another eight is 28. Math.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a d8 there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. Okay, so that's 14 and 28. I'd say that Tidal Wave, how many gallons of water would we say each one of those is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's 30 foot tall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's ten foot tall, ten foot wide, so that's...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And 30 feet long.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Four gallons, easily.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say we're looking at close to 50 gallons of water, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Probably way more than 50 gallons.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot of gallons, for sure.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I think it's like a million gallons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Somewhere between 50 and a million.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why didn't we switch to metric?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be a few hundred gallons of water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the purposes of this, for the width of it and the space you had to pass it through, we'll say roughly 60 gallons of water passes through each of these elementals. Water susceptibility, for every five feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes one point of cold damage, so they both take an additional 60 points of damage. Which destroys both of the elementals.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck yeah! Do that again, Keyleth!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I will!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Again, again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Keyleth, you have more movement still, if you want to move somewhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh! I'll scootch up a bit, start moving towards...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's good, that works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That brings us to Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rush up where Scanlan is, and attack that little guy on the ground there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm the little guy on the ground.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, not you, the other guy that's next to him. And can I use a reckless attack--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you raging first, or are you--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh yeah, raging. I would like to rage. And then use reckless attack against him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you got two attacks, reckless attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Awesome. 18 on the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you see this barreling form of pure anger and blade come rushing past as Grog slams into the salamander twice with his blade. That fails first constitution, and fails second. So you gain plus two strength, salamander loses two strength.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, because you've taken... With each strike within melee of the salamander's heated body, it's so intense by its proximity that you suffer six points of fire damage from the first melee attack against you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She gave me resistance, so halved to three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved to two.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Halved to two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The other one would be 12, so you take six.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight total.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see now these glistening, almost ruby-like sharp teeth in its wide grin. (snarl) These long catfish-like tendrils that waft off its face as it slams down the spear towards you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, you brought a fork to a sword fight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is going to be a 23 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take 12 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved to six. And it's going to also turn around and its tail, its long snake tail (whoosh) whips you. That is going to be an 18 to hit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That misses!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It misses, all righty. The tail comes towards you, and you knock it out of the way with Craven Edge. That will end its turn. Top of the round, I'm going to make a roll for the consistency of the currently cooled lava pool. It maintains. However, you feel your feet cracking beneath--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think I'll stay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Feels nice here. Maybe a timeshare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This efreet-- let me look at the logistics of this spell now, because--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's pissed off in a ball.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yeah, this spell is awful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It can't do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is enclosed for the duration, up to a minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, Matt. Sorry, Matt.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's like, first the beholder, now my flame genie.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's pushing against, and it takes these two flame balls it conjures and throws them out towards you guys. They just go (impacts) against the sphere and then go out, and it's just (growling). It's really, really pissed off. It can't do anything.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (singing) Like a genie in a bottle. Got to rub me the right way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we all collectively look up at him, look sad, and go, aw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm looking forward to rolling it back through the rift.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, can we do that? Like a hamster ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Ending its turn, because it can't do anything, Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm going to chuck three daggers at the salamander in front of Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Right there, about?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right in front of her. Between her and the-- yeah. There. One, two, three to the salamander.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 21. Then 25. And then 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all three hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, and because he's flanked by Grog, the first one gets sneak attack damage. Two plus eight, 14, 16, 17, 22, 23, 25, 31 for the first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And then ten for the second and eight for the third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Good to know. (whoosh) As you jump in front of the way of Keyleth, you unleash all three daggers in rapid succession, each one finding its mark (impacts) into the body of the now profusely bleeding salamander. You can see now streaks of its own blood are pouring down, boiling on contact with air, the significant difference in temperature from the exterior and its actual interior body causing it to change from a liquid to a gas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's our rogue.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: End your turn?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I look over my shoulder at Keyleth like a dumb schmuck for a second, and then back at the salamander.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Vex, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Am I hiding? Am I hidden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can roll a stealth check. A hide action is a hide action. As a rogue, do you have the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that number?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know what number that is.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's completely smooshed off of the dice!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That means that existence is about to end.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's literally--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just roll this. Roll another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, you do not have cunning action yet, that's a 2nd-level rogue ability, so you would use your action to hide.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But I had my skirmisher stealth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you go from hide to hide you can do that, but you are not hidden at the beginning of the round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a rookie rogue mistake. It happens in the beginning.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. It's fine, it's fine, it's fine. All right, then I'm just going to...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: At the higher levels you mess up the assassinate thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything's a concentration thing, so I'm just going to lightning arrow the giant fire guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll for attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. 30!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That'll hit anything.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She just hit a sparrow on a paraglider.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's 4d8 lightning damage on a hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Well, half good, half bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18. That's it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 points of lightning damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as you turn around the side of the tree, releasing the arrow. As it goes through the air, streaking, it suddenly bursts into an arcing bit of energy (crackling energy), a bolt of lightning that strikes into and begins to spill around the insides of the elemental. You can see it shakes it off as the energy disperses.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to use my bonus action to hide then, with the skirmisher's thing. For my skirmisher stealth, I can use a bonus action to hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm pretty sure you have to... If you go from hiding to hiding, you can do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You told me, I swear!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Read the ability, read the ability!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, where was it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right now, on the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, where is it? I don't know where it is. I'll find it, and then I'll find out. And then I'll roll for stealth then if it works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say for the sake right now of the distraction, go ahead and do it for now, and we'll correct it later if need be. I would rather you have fun than not. So, what's your stealth roll?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My stealth roll is 15, it doesn't even matter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 15, she said 15.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not in the book, it's in the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's in the PDF. Anyway, what did you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This elemental creature--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh jeez. Here it comes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Comes up over-- (yelling)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, he's dead, he's dead, he's dead!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He tripped at the finish line!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As another one tears out of the portal and begins making its way here at full movement to there. This one's going to go ahead and make two strikes towards you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two attacks towards me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. That's going to be 11.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that the attack roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Elementals can't roll today. And you're already on fire, so its fire form won't make much of a difference to you either way. All right, so that's going to end its turn, and the other elemental pours in, that's the end of their round. All right, that brings us to Gern.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Feel the Gern, feel the Gern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Flames are out, you push-- not Stimpy-- Coral off of you, Coral standing (groan).

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Does it count as my turn if I ask him a question about the orb?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you can make a quick little aside. You have to shout it out, though.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: If I attack the genie, is it just going to attack the orb, and then he's going to be free?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes! I'm not looking at you, by the way.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: It really hurts, I didn't realize how much that hurt!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I know!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I've learned a valuable lesson today, while I've half-caught on fire. Can I cast some type of a mental spell through the orb to the fire genie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Would it be too crafty if I were to cast Modify Memory? Could I modify the fire genie's memory to forget to not kill himself? I'll take that as a no. Can I modify the fire genie's memory into thinking that he's completed the task that he came to this realm to complete, and that he might go home?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'd love to try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. What's the range on the spell?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Modify Memory, where is it? There we go, 5th-level.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, God, I hope this works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a 30-foot range, so you're going to have to get a lot closer. You're getting up from prone, which is half your movement, so you only have 15 more feet you can move, so you wouldn't be able to even get into range.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, shit, I can't cast Modify Memory anyway, I've already cast two spells like that today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, Cone of Cold. You're out of fifth level.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: So which way-- is there a chain of people? I see a couple right there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's a laser pointer if you need it.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Thank you. This guy's new, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and this guy hasn't been touched really, except for her lightning arrow.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, I can shoot lightning breath, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Should I shoot at this guy or this guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, the guy next to me might hit me, but whatever!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'll throw some lightning breath at this person right here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you stand up and dust off yourself, your fantastic zipper-covered dance jacket, brushing it off with your hands, you lumber forward to the outskirts of this newly cracking rock crust that once was a lava pool and will soon be once again, inhale. As you guys look around, you see this glow, this blue crackling blow-- glow on the inside of his mouth. The blow is how he got to the mountain and then got inspired to shoot the lightning.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm flying high, but I can't get an erection. I've done so much blow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gern Blanston. Flying high, no erection.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Sad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This crackling electric energy in the back of his toothy mouth as he-- (snarl) releases this blast of lightning energy forward, striking into the chest of the fire elemental that freshly stepped out of the portal. What's the saving throw DC on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. It rolled a nine, so go ahead and roll the damage on the breath. How much is it?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: It's 4d6.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Love the way you're rolling today.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm rolling really bad tonight!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Four, ten, 15, 16!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've definitely got its attention.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your bonus action, would you like to do anything with your compadres?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, right. I still have two left, don't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You do like dancing.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Just to distract him a little bit, because I seem to have caught his attention, so I'd like to start a little dance party right there. This fellow right here, the zombie, can do a little break dancing, and then the skeleton can do a bit of the bird, and then maybe the worm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As the skeleton leaps down into the worm (crash), just flat laid out, cracking part of its pelvis...

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Dancing without music.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. No music whatsoever.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Is the zombie like (zombie groaning). The tip of his arm falls off at the ulna.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pop and lock! Pop and lock!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I'm going to go ahead and--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: These guys are great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to ask you to go ahead and roll a performance check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We never do those!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel really bad that I killed Carol now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, that was almost bad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, plus, plus--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you have inspiration!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Use it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Use a d10!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the time.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh. So seven, plus performance plus one, eight, and then a d10.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll the d10, add it.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Jesus Christ. Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten. Trying to recall and hum the song that Scanlan once sang to you, naught but ten minutes before, you don't recall it much at all, and it comes out (tuneless humming).

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (singing) Gern, Gern, It's Gern. It's Gern time!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pitchy, little pitchy. Flat.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (singing) It's Gern, time to Gern!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, now you're sharp.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (singing) Gern it all the way. I'm doing great!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep, your name was in the song!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: (singing) Gern is my name and this is definitely the song that I'm singing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's discordant enough that on a low wisdom save I'll say the fire elemental's next attack has disadvantage. That was the strangest round of combat I think I've ever had in D&D. All right, Percy, you're up. Follow that. First, top of your round, you take nine points of fire damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's halved to five.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have the skirmisher stealth! As a bonus action at the end of your turn, you can make a dexterity (stealth) check to hide again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wasn't sure if you had to be hidden at the top to do it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to shift my Hex to the tiny little (Irish accent) fucker. God, you've got me doing it now. Damn it. It's a plague.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: It's contagious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To which one, this guy there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No no no, the one furthest from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, right there. I'll move my Hex to him. I'm going to bust out the Bad News rifle, I'm going to sit, and I'm going to take a nice, calm, calculated sharpshooter shot at him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And Bad News just goes (click).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Did you misfire?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I misfired.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh no! You get down with the gun and (click). You look at it and you can see some of the metal bowing in the centerpiece like, "That's bad. That's bad. That's bad. That's bad!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's fine. I put it down, I pull out the pistol, and I'm going to take a shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's hot. It's really hot. Just keep going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was really awkward.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe the heat made you misfire.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just roll the dice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're also 60 feet apart at the moment.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 hits. Sharpshooter? No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's sharpshooter? Wow. Nice roll.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six, 12, 22 points of damage. And I reload, and that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn. Okay. Finishing up Percy, that brings us to Scanlan. You're still concentrating on Otiluke's Resilient Sphere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes I am.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The gnome has got this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, how's that stuff under my feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pretty rough. You're going to want to step off of it very soon, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to step into it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love you, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I can fire a Lightning Bolt and hit both of those guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, snap. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And yeah, that's it. That'll be my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still move after that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, good! Okay, good, thank you for saving me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the bolt arcs past, go ahead.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I saw that, it was great!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, for once! Thank you! Thank you, it was for you!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Much appreciated!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five, no. And a 12 plus three, 15, no. Both fail their saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so 8d6?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 8d6 points of lightning damage to both of them. It's a wonderful display, Gern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I ship Scanlan and Gern.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Shh, guys, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 33, nice roll.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, that Lightning Bolt was so big. And wide!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's the width that really does it.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: It really does. It's not so much the length.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the girth of Gern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I will re-inspire Gern. Oh, wait, you're still injured, aren't you?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will heal Gern.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With another Healing Word. This time at third level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, a second spell can only be as high as second level. You used two spells in one round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's still very romantic, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, I'll do a 2nd-level Healing Word, and I will sing to him, because I'm running out of things that rhyme with his name: (singing) Gern down for what! (EDM beat) Gern down for what! That's it.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Might I remind you I am unable to get an erection at the moment?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, in spite of that, the blue pill does give you ten additional hit points healed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did the skeleton and the zombie start dancing better, after that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it actually does pick up their pace a little bit now that they have a backtrack.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: What is the elemental doing while they're dancing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's currently being surrounded by a swirl of Hex shadow and looking around very confused and wondering why it got up in the morning.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Where did the glow sticks come from?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you want to move out?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I can move out?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you can.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will he take a swipe at me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It will yes, but better than possibly falling in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm still on fire, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you are. Takes an action to put it out, though, unfortunately. That's 18 plus six. I believe that does hit you. You take 12 points of fire damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus whatever I was on fire for.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already took that damage earlier.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I did? At the beginning of my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, I rolled for that already, you take nine points of fire damage, I think it was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay, plus 12?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That ends your turn, Scanlan. Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we have these two assholes in front of us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My name is Vax.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, depends on the day. So, that guy is still alive too, yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all three of these guys are alive. And this guy's in a hamster ball.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Being pissed!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just like a weather balloon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah it's a rover just holding him in place.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to Tidal Wave again. Tidal Wave! Right here, this way, fucking with these two guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ('The Prisoner' theme starts playing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Six and an eight, both fail. Who is number one?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I am not a number, I'm a free man!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So good, so good. The original one, not the remake. Patrick McGoohan. Two failed saving throws, go ahead and roll damage on that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's really good, I'm warning you right now. Seven and seven is 14 plus another six, brings me to 20, plus eight, 28, again. That's what I had last time right? 28.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Kismet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 points of water damage, plus the additional blast of water gallons surging through them, manages to completely scatter both these guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We actually had a Critter tweet us how much water.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much water would be in a Tidal Wave?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 225 gallons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, there is no way they're surviving that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And then technically in Tidal Wave it says the water then spreads out across the ground in all directions, extinguishing unprotected flames in the area within 30 feet of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unprotected flames are different than lava pools. Water doesn't cool it, it just evaporates.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've got steam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You have a very heavy cloud of steam now, that is (steam sound) to the side. The dancing skeleton and zombie are now just these shadows lit in this cool music video light now as they're (groan) dancing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As if this were a Telltale game, at the top of the screen it says, 'Keyleth will remember this'.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: ("Thriller" starts playing)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use my bonus action--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perfect. This is happening, guys. Is that the rest of your turn, Keyleth? Do you want to move somewhere?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Question.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, what's your question?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I theoretically cast a Grasping Vine coming out of the hellmouth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Grasping Vine is a 4th-level spell, I believe, and as a bonus action you can't do anything more than a 2nd-level spell in the same round.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck, never mind. Actually, no, that's not true. I will take my bonus Healing Word to toss another Healing Word, just 1st-level, over to Gern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone's keeping the dance master alive over there.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh my god, amazing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So you heal eight points, Gern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of healing to you, Gern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's gone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We can't save him. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I use another reckless attack and I make the first strike against the guy right in front of me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jesus. Better. 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14 misses, unfortunately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are these with great weapon master?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, just reckless attack. This one is with great weapon master. Nope. Better. 16 plus nine is 25, minus five is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yahtzee! Five, ten, 18, 28!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That infuriates you, and you lift up Craven Edge between the blades of the trident. It's a test of strength as you both tense, and eventually you lift it back, and with the backswing, slash him right across his chest with that blow. You see a strike of extremely hot, hot blood splatter across, (sizzling), singe the front of your chest and leave little burn marks on you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like freckles.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't want to fuck with his beard!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does make the save.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: She has a name.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, Laura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well played. Does that end your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's the end of my turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why am I laughing at that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Darling, shush.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Efreet's going to start pushing against the ball, which is going to begin to coast through the air this way.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does he spin the globe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just gliding through slowly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Genie hamster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that's about all he can do this turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Vax, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man, all right. I'm in a good spot, I'll just throw three more daggers at the salamander that Grog has not yet killed. First one is a natural 20, the second one is a 13, and the third one is, aw, fuck, is a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Hold off on those two attacks, just in case how much your critical sneak attack does.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Five, six, seven, eight, 12, 18, 21, 25. 25, so you double the dice, is 56 for the first one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you throw the dagger, it goes right past Grog's ear and you hear the (whoosh) of the wind as it just brushes past your face. After you finish your backswing with Craven Edge, as the salamander creature rears back from the impact, it looks towards you, and its eyes twitch ever so slightly to your right as it sees the incoming blade a little too late as it (impact) right into its right eye socket. Its tongue lolls out of its jaw as it falls onto its back, and its tail moves and twitches for a few seconds before it eventually goes limp.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now he's dead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog stomps it into the ground. The twitching stops, the salamander now destroyed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does the dagger stay in his eye socket?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's currently in the eye socket, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh. Can I reach down and grab it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You reach down and grab the dagger, and as you pull it out, (poof) it turns into smoke in your hand.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Holy shit! I look back at Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, how did you do that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know! I think maybe I'm a magic user now! And I start trying to cast reanimate person on the dead thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: That's not how you do that!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, no, no, I've got to concentrate!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (straining)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are we going to do with this giant ball?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, can you vine him down? Or, Gern, do you have something that can move things?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I--

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Go ahead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, go, you first. Please, Gern.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Does anyone have a large purple hand they could use?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think he would lose--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a concentration spell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, one spell at a time.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I thought I had some sort of a Telekinesis spell, but I guess I don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chromatic Orb?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, that's an attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you bring it down, Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can try. Can I do a Grasping Vine from the bottom underneath of him, and see if I can?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's over lava.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's got something!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Oh, sorry, go ahead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing? I know what you're doing, what are you doing?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I could either manipulate his memory, or I do have a flying broom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Yes, I have a flying broom.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like you do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you going to bat him down like you're sweeping the sky?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I could fly up and gently glide him down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How come everybody flies?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you doing your vine as well?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let me see how this goes first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You leap up onto it and grab onto the front as you shoot up from the side.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Going up to catch the golden bitch!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's flying brooms?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About three feet it sinks, as you're just standing on top of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's as far as it goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to do?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'd like to try to cast a memory spell on it, if possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Well, you've already cast a 5th-level spell twice, how many 5th-level spells can you cast per day?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, unfortunately you're out of 5th-level slots.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Could I cast it on you to forget that I've already cast it twice?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scanlan, how much time do we have with this bubble?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A minute, but about 30 seconds have gone by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're getting down to about the 40-second mark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I put myself out while all of this is happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can he push down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can jump onto it and begin to push down.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm going to push down with all my might, to try to get him down on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You leap in the air and jump on it again and as you do the orb (sinking noise) and just slowly, over the next 15 seconds shove it down to the point where you're over the orb on the very top, as you can feel the spell about to dissipate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, Grog! Stop trying to reanimate that thing and hit the freaking red guy into the hole!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, go ahead and roll an arcana check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, he's the best at arcana.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20. Get it. Get it. Reanimate that fucker.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six. This isn't working.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Must be a rookie mistake.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are we trying to do, shove him back into the hole?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shove him in the hole!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog, shove that fucking thing in there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's over lava.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are made of hit points!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, fuck it-- This is your thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do the vines from out of the portal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it has to have an anchor point somewhere.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, fuck it, now I just run, in a rage, I run into the lava and I start shoving him straight toward the flaming vagina hole.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just roll a strength check. You have advantage because you're still raging. Although you wouldn't be raging anymore because you spent time concentrating on the spell, you could go into a rage for this if you'd like to, spend another use of your rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'll use another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you go into a rage. All right, as you step into the lava, you suffer 26 points of fire damage from wading up to your knees in molten rock.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Halved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Halved because of your resistance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So 12. I rolled a 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to catch yourself on the side, grabbing the broom and holding it out here as you're stepping the other direction. I want you to make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right. Seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have inspiration!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. He used it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you (slipping noise) slip off the top of the sphere, begin to fall back toward the lava behind you, in a very Lord of the Rings Gollum tumbling into Mount Doom type of view. (sploosh) Back first into the lava.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I feel fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, you take six points of fire damage. Impacting-- rolled really low on that. (sploosh) You can feel the back of your scales and the flesh on your back immediately begin to burn with horrifying pain. You're holding your broom aloft, 'cause you don't want that to go in the fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run forward to try to help him out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And steal the broom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (disgruntled moans)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Crap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can Keyleth run up, do I have an action?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now we're going back to the initiative order, since combat has re-initiated with the sphere opened. That brings us to the top. The efreet, now freed from its sphere, is going to go first.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's mad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is livid. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just want you to know, I was trying to free you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know these people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: These assholes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can you believe how rude these people are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keep away. Let's see. It's going to cast Invisibility on itself, then it vanishes from view.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As it does that, do I recognize the spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cast Counterspell.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because it is a 2nd-level spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As its form begins to vanish, Scanlan, what do you do to counter it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to sing-- No! I'm going to distract it with this.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With an app?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With an app. (airhorn) (song starts) Oh, wait that's not what I wanted to do!

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Keep going! Distract him with your morning radio program!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that bit of chaos is just enough, as he begins to cast his innate Invisibility spell, it looks over. "What in the-- Shit!" And loses the spell concentration. The invisibility field vanishes, and it stands there above. All right, that brings us to Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, shite. All right, I'm going to leap over the lava pit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an acrobatics check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. That'll be a 28. I run up behind Grog, and I should be within--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Darting around the side there, because you are hasted with this, so you can actually just dart around the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, right behind Grog. I should be within 60 feet of the efreeti.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'll throw three daggers at it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: First one is a 34.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second one is a 27. Third is a 29, so they all hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shit, jeez, 34.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But there's no sneak attack on these--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How did you get 34 on your attack?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know anymore. I rolled really high, and I rolled my attack bonus, like a 19 plus 11? A 30?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 30, okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. A 30 works.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Math looked right when I did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 34, I was just like (groaning) bleeding from the nose, I couldn't deal with it. 30 hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no subterfuge, it might be stupidity. First one's a ten, second one was a ten, and the third one is a seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven. Got it. Cool. That ends your turn, Vax. That brings us to Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hunter's Mark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. It is...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It wasn't, because I used Lightning Arrow, so it dropped the concentration on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's right, so you Hunter's Mark once again. Put that back on there. All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Although it doesn't really matter because I'm going to cast Lightning Arrow on him and I lose my Hunter's Mark again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Trauma from the earlier episodes. Hunter's Mark!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so Lightning Arrow again, go ahead and roll for the attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah! Oh, that's 31?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gern, you're on deck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 points of damage, all righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (impact) The lightning slams into his chest, and you can see it arcs through its scimitar that it's holding up in its hand, and it shakes and almost drops the weapon, and catches its arm as the electricity disperses out the edge of the blade and looks back at you. He's now glaring at both you and Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my movement to run up around the molten lava and hold my hand out for Gern, so that he can use me to get out of the molten lava.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that's as far as you can get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gern, top of your turn, you take 24 points of fire damage from the lava as you're sinking into it. (sizzling)

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: So, can I jump up and then cast a spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right now you can try and cast, in this area, but you would have a hard time concentrating. I'd say you'd have to take a concentration check to even get a spell out, because you're in so much pain. I'd say you would probably want to move out of the lava before you do that.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: All right, I'll get out of the lava.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you (straining) stand up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Take my hand!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too deep and you're having to basically wade your way through, which is burning your hands as you get over there.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: What about my broom?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were holding your broom! So here's what you do. You go ahead and you lift yourself up out of the lava onto the broom and then (blowing) push. You're not fully on it, and it's hard to engage its mental commands directly with the current amount of chaos around you, but you do manage to skirt yourself to the very edge of the lava and land on your feet, which are numb after the sheer amount of pain you've suffered, and you don't even want to look down at what you look like from the waist below.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you need me to hold your broom while you cast your spell?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Please!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, don't do-- Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So she takes the broom from your hand. What are you going to cast?

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: Disintegrate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Disintegrate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a spell?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a big one, we've seen that happen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Who did that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The giants got disintegrated.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: I'm fairly pissed at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you should be. All right, so you get to go ahead and roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get the fucker, you dirty bastard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disintegrate. Oh, it just makes a dexterity saving throw! It doesn't even get a chance. All right, what's your spell DC again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16. It rolled a two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be bad. All right, roll 10d6 plus 40 damage. Damn!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Disintegrate doesn't mess around. It's an all or nothing spell. If they make the save, nothing. You don't make it, (explosion).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 76 points of force damage. As you get out, you can see your vest itself is burning, there's still elements of embers burning at the edges of the leather and the cloth. The bottom part of your scales are a combination of blue, black, and little bits have cracked open where you can see red flesh underneath. There's a lot of burn damage.

lines.name: CHRIS
lines.text: The zippers are very hot, I might add.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The efreet, who is currently focused on Scanlan and watching Vex run past, looks down just in time to see you release the spell. Opens his eyes and attempts to dodge out of the way, unfortunately not fast enough. It blasts in the side of its shoulder and you can see as a whole chunk of its back muscle, shoulder, and lower torso are just turned to dust, exposing bone and elements of its musculature and flesh underneath. It goes (snarls) and looks down. It can't even make a loud emission of pain, it's just gutturally whispering its horrible suffering. As it looks down, it reaches up with its hand and cauterizes the wound on the back of its body, leaving it a charred cinder. It glares down at you, extremely angry. "I hate you most of all, scarecrow!"

lines.name: CHRIS
